END MAP
START PROPERTIES
Player,95,105
BackgroundMusic,magicClockShop,audio/bgm/MagicClockShop.mp3
Portal,95,195,overWorld,235,130
Portal,105,195,overWorld,245,130
Sign,95,105,Use the joystick in the bottom left of the screen to walk to another sign! (Don't forget the signs to the north),50
Sign,135,105,Hold down the ammo button (beside the sword button) then select a type of ammo by dragging across and releasing or releasing and tapping.,50
Sign,65,145,Once you've read all the signs try leaving the room by the door at the south.,50
Sign,35,15,To pick up potions walk over them. To use them open the back pack and click them. Effects will be applied when you close the backpack,50
Sign,65,15,Speed and damage temporarily increase your speed and damge. Health potions replenish your health.,50
Sign,135,25,To equip your bow and use arrows - hold down the ammo button (beside the sword button) and select the bow. Click the button to use ammo.,50
Sign,135,45,Try picking up the arrows behind these barrels. Once you pick up the arrows they will go into your backpack. To equip them open the backpack and click the arrows.,50
Consumable,HealthPotion,150,100,10
Consumable,HealthPotion,160,100,10
Consumable,Key,100,100,10
Consumable,DamagePotion,140,130,10
Consumable,DamagePotion,130,190,10
Consumable,SpeedPotion,130,180
Consumable,SpeedPotion,140,180
Consumable,ArrowDrop,165,25,5
END PROPERTIES
